column3: Good idea, I've noticed this being slow in some of my tools.  Unfortunately, during a reorg I think your cache could end up pointing off into space. It's probably fine to just invalidate the cache every time the chain is updated.\n

or do what pynode does, and maintain a (height)->(list of block hashes) index... ;)

weak ACK, but sounds like it needs updating based on @gmaxwell 's comments
Moved to main.cpp and added code to clear the cache whenever the best block changes.\n
